author: Special Correspondent
text: The Joint Action Committee of All Farmers’ Associations has called for a rail roko in all stations across the State on April 5 to highlight the plight of farmers. Speaking to the media at Kumbakonm after offering condolences to the family of farmer Dhavasekar (50), who ended his life due to debt at Kothangudi, committee members said the government should not try to conceal the suicide of farmers. – Special Correspondent
title: Farmers plan agitation
